description:
Running Icehouse-3, RDO
KVM, NFS shared storage, Cinder (LVM-backed).

Trying to live-migrate an instance that has a volume-based root fails.
The instance updates the hypervisor to the correct target.  However,
the instance moves to the status: ACTIVE power-state: PAUSED state.
Any attempt at UNPAUSE will cause the instance to go to the ERROR state.


Others have seen a similar error:  http://lists.openstack.org/pipermail/openstack/2014-May/007377.html

However, I cannot find a matching bug.
title: Volume-based, live-migration fails

comments.content:
Running Icehouse-3, RDO
KVM, NFS shared storage, Cinder (LVM-backed).

Trying to live-migrate an instance that has a volume-based root fails.
The instance updates the hypervisor to the correct target.  However,
the instance moves to the status: ACTIVE power-state: PAUSED state.
Any attempt at UNPAUSE will cause the instance to go to the ERROR state.


Others have seen a similar error:  http://lists.openstack.org/pipermail/openstack/2014-May/007377.html

However, I cannot find a matching bug.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~aaron-smith

comments.content: Can you provide the relevant log files of from n-cpu, n-api, n-sch, c-api, and c-vol
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague

comments.content: Will do.  Sorry for not including them in the original submission.  Needed to confirm with the engineer that is reproducing the issue.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~aaron-smith

comments.content: [Expired for OpenStack Compute (nova) because there has been no activity for 60 days.]
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~janitor
